body.p: Pivotal provides a full range of commercial support and services for RabbitMQ.

You can purchase commercial support agreements for the most recent open source release RabbitMQ. Alternatively, Pivotal includes RabbitMQ as part of the vFabric™ Suite Advanced for which commercial licenses and support are available. In both cases a range of SLAs are available.
We offer on-line and instructor-led training courses worldwide that cover learning messaging with AMQP, use cases and patterns with RabbitMQ and best practice design and architecture.

Our professional consulting services are highly flexible to address specific issues such as on-site troubleshooting, design review, deployment planning, project delivery and other value-adding services tailored to suit your needs.
Contact us for more information or visit the vFabric RabbitMQ pages at vmware.com.
